gpcm.normal module¶

class gpcm.normal.NaturalNormal(lam, prec)[source]¶

Bases: object

A normal distribution parametrised by its natural parameters.

Parameters

  • lam (column vector) – Mean premultiplied by the precision.

  • prec (matrix) – Precision, the inverse covariance.

property dim¶

Dimensionality.

Type

int

property dtype¶

Data type.

Type

dtype

classmethod from_normal(dist)[source]¶

parameters of dist.
